website_summaries.verdict: By far one of the more popular furniture covers available, offering a quilted, reversible pattern for style conscious customers.
pros: Strap suspension system keeps cover from moving
Customers appreciate the nearly perfect fit
cons: Some customers had issues with the strap buckles breaking

website_summaries.verdict: A variety of colors and patterns to perfectly match any home décor.
pros: Available in a wide range of colors and patterns
Made from a soft but durable fabric that's machine-washable
Large, adjustable elastic bands help keep cover firmly in place
Sofa, love seat, and chair covers are all available
cons: Cover does not work well on leather furniture

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: It fits great. I really like it. I had to take a picture to prove that it came out better than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I have to reearrange the couch cover daily (it moves every time someone sits on it so it would be a daily chore getting it to lay flat and nice on my couch), the loops that keep the straps in place broke after 1 year of use. Now I have to either take this broken one into a tailor to get it fixed or I can buy a different, more reliable brand of couch cover.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money..
customer_reviews.text: The absolute worst sofa cover I have ever purchase. I ordered the proper size yet came up 2" too short on each side. In fact, based on the listed size on the instructions it should have been 2" too long. After fastening it down, it continues to shift and bundle up like its been placed in the dirty clothes hamper. In addition, it picks up lint like a magnet. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: I purchased two of the couch covers and two of ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the couch covers and two of the chair covers. Unfortunately, once you wash these, fibers release from the batting. I spent 20 minutes trying to get all of the fibers off of the covers after I washed them. They are awful. Would return if it was not past the return eligibility date.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in place at all.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. I researched different brands and kinds of couch covers. This one seemed to have the best reviews for the price point I was looking for. However, despite the back strap, I always ends up like the picture above. We have to straighten and retuck every time someone gets up of the couch. We even tried the elastic straps that keep bedsheets in place, but despite our best efforts, it comes undone every single time. I wish I could return it for a refund but that time has passed. I would not recommend this product to anyone, unless they like to straighten and retuck every time you move.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A good looking sofa protector!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the oversized sofa version although the regular sofa probably would have worked just fine. Although it was a little awkward with the band across the back and getting the tucking correct, I'm glad we did, because there is ample length down the back so when the dogs jump on it, it does not fall down. We have a big shedder in our border collie mix and have been able to shake it off and/or sticky roll it with no issues. It's comfortable to sit on and looks great. Not sure how you reverse it because of the band in back, but we like the chocolate color. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sissy39Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The vendor doesn't honor their "no questions asked warranty".
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these to use on my couch to replace two super cheap fleece throws I had been using for a year and a half. I found a tear in one of them having only been in rotation for under 2 months. The product page mentions a no questions asked warranty and specifically asks you to contact them via Amazon for any product issues including issues damage done by your dog, the vendor then responds telling you to go through Amazon even though it's out of the return period. If you're going to make me fight with Amazon to get you to honor the "no questions asked" warranty" then it's not really a no questions asked warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: It shrinks. Period.
customer_reviews.text: Well I liked the product, kept the sofa fairly clean, fit perfectly UNTIL I washed it (in cold water, low temp dry) and it did shrink a full 3 inches so lengthwise so it doesn't fit great on the sofa. After the initial washing it didn't seem to shrink further, so if you want this, when measuring add on for shrinkage.
customer_reviews.author: hopeithelpsyou

customer_reviews.title: Constant re-adjustment and not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed for a few reasons: 1. They band they provide to cinch the material and make it non-slip does not cinch to a point where the cover stays on. I have to re-cover and re-cinch every 4 days. 2. There is no water resistance protection. 3. They dont cover the front of the couch I unfortunately waited too long to return them so I am stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sexi_ginger

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. I got the green and it’s reversible and little large,But I got the extra large for my couch and also the love seat It works great The material is very nice and easy to clean off the dog hair. I have a 125 lb bernese mtn dog. I use the fur wizard to go over the couch constantly Really love the fabric. I do believe it also can go in the dryer. My other cover is nice to. But it has to be air dried. So you have to wash and dry according to the weather
customer_reviews.author: Lory Fino

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Its already paid for itself, probably more than once in just over a month. The microfiber fabric on my sofa is nice, but easily destroyed by anything and everything that it comes into contact with. Spills, food, pet hair, even overgrown puppy nails can leave behind everlasting scratch marks. The cover isnt water proof & doesn't claim to be, but if you catch the spill quickly & remove the wet cover, the liquid wont make it thru to the fabric below. So far, it seems to have held up really well thru multiple washings already. I Love it! Plan to purchase more and would recommend this product to anyone 😊
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my sofa
customer_reviews.text: I was having a hard time finding the right dimensions for a sofa slipcover let alone solid color. there are literally thousands out there. The secret I found was to measure the width of the cushions. Just by saying fits 3 cushion sofa doesn't mean it will fit. I finally figured it out I needed an oversize slipcover for a 3 cushion sofa. When the Sofa Shield Slipcover came I had to try it on right away and guess what It fit Perfect. Looks Great and I am Happy with this selection. The only thing I was disappointed I was looking for a solid light Gray or Dark Gray. Color choices were limited.
customer_reviews.author: Star 711

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third product I have from these guys. The recliner one works and fits great, the oversized chair one works pretty good and this one is a disaster. The back falls down, the sides fall off, the strap is very tight and the hooks repeatedly slide off. It’s waaay to small everywhere except the seat. I measured and ordered the regular couch one accordingly. I wouldn’t consider my couch overly fluffy or anything but this thing doesn’t fit at all. Real disappointment from these guys usual high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Not great on “pillow back” style sofas
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my couch and a matching one for a chair. The chair one was perfect. The one for the couch/sofa didn’t work for us. With a pillow back (vs. solid back) it was impossible to get it looking smooth and tight. Knowing that we’d forever be adjusting it, we decided to send it back. Still gave 4 stars because it’s very good looking and soft, but just doesn’t work well on some types of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDiva

customer_reviews.title: Great for 75” couch sitting area!
customer_reviews.text: The oversized sofa shield fit my 75” couch (sitting area width). Description says fits up to a 78” sitting area, but really it’s just big enough for 75” to get adequate coverage on the sides. Washes easily and the factory smell comes out after 1 wash (I used detergent plus 1/2 cup vinegar). Recommended for keeping a couch stain-free/sweat free, esp if your couch cushion covers aren’t machine washable/water washable. Style-wise, it looks like a pet cover, but it does the job. The strap works well, would suggest using it especially if the couch is not up against (flush with) a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Yaki Jan

customer_reviews.title: did well in the washer.
customer_reviews.text: Don't have a pet. I have daily house "guests" that work for taking care of someone in my house. to protect the new couches from various drinks, dirt and dust we are using these covers. so far, they have survived the washer and dryer. followed the care instructions. they do have a little wrinkle to them now from washing but it's okay. also, much like some heavy dyed clothes we had bought and washed by themselves there is a lot of colored muddy lint. it's an HE washer, and I don't know if this will ever stop making this redish mud. not an issue, just odd.
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: Ripped in less than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Through Amazon, I was able to get a hold of the seller who replaced my covers free of charge. I now trap them from the top, under the couch and to the bottom of the cover. They stay in place better this way too. Mine ripped after being on my couch for not even 2 weeks. They're a lot thinner than expected, more like a thick blanket. Water soaks right in, so not water resistant. Spot cleans and launder just fine. Not sure on stains because mine are black. Didn't see an option to contact seller.
customer_reviews.author: Dems59

customer_reviews.title: Cover it up
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product because our dog was jumping on the couch and it was beginning to get dirty. The cover is NOT stain resistant or water resistant. It will get wet if u spill your drink on it. Now we have put it in the washing machine and it will get certain stains out. It’s easy to put on the couch and take off if you want to shake off some of the hair. Please like my review if it was useful!!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Diane Restrepo

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on leather furniture
customer_reviews.text: Nothing in the description indicates that it does not work on leather furniture, but AFTER ordering and AFTER product was shipped, I got an email from Sofa Shield stating, in part: "As a reminder, our slipcovers work best on fabric furniture and are not recommended for leather since the slipcover can bunch or slide on the leather material." A "REMINDER"? This was not stated in the product description on Amazon. Must return this product.
customer_reviews.author: chels608

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, nice price, but it must have bypassed quality inspection.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these sofa covers, one for my loveseat and the other for my large sofa. The cover for my loveseat fits great and looks good. The cover for the large sofa fits great, looks nice, but one of the loops to tie it back is missing. I am not returning the item because it is too much of a hassle to take it off, repack and ship it. I just hope it will stay in place without my being able to secure it. That is the only reason I gave it a 3 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rolston

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought this first
customer_reviews.text: It fits (measure your furniture -- it won't fit a really big sofa). It's not a pet hair magnet and what pet hair there is will brush or sticky roller right off. It washes well. It doesn't slip much -- I have to adjust it here and there but not twice a day. That, of course, will depend on your sofa fabric. Anything will slip on leather. The color is great and the price was right and it is 10X better than the one I had which is a "name brand" in slipcovers and is currently in the Goodwill pile. I will revisit this if it doesn't hold up but as of now I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different furniture covers and none worked well or were a good size. I ordered the Large and XL of these in Charcoal/Linen. The XL size fits perfectly over the long part of my sectional and the L works well for the loveseat portion. Unfortunately this company's "chase" cover is not the right size for the chase on my sectional or I would have purchased the entire set. I appreciate the straps that go behind the cushions, because if keeps the cover from sliding down when my dog goes onto the furniture. Even without the strap I think it would stay up okay since it has a very long back.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Right size, right color and right price! Metal hooks too!
customer_reviews.text: I have a turquoise themed room and I bought the Seafoam color hoping it wouldn't be too green. It's perfect. It's muted enough to not "take over" the entire room. The fabric is soft and the fit couldn't be better. So happy, I'm going to buy one for my recliner too! The hooks that attach to the elastic strap are METAL. From what I read in previous reviews about the plastic hooks breaking, the company actually listened to and fixed the breaking hook problem. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Sofa Shield  Great Product
customer_reviews.text: the cover is awesome. thick and soft and cover the whole sofa. my sofa from arm rest to arm rest is 90. I measured the seat width from one side to the other as seen in the video , and it is 68 inches. I bought an extra large cover which would cover up to 78 seat width. 10 inches larger to give more coverage so it wont shift or pull when sit down. it drapes perfectly on the sofa and I don't even have to use the belt. and because it is 10 inches longer , the belt ties perfectly without pulling the fabric . Just Perfect. my color is charcoal/charcoal for my dark gray sofa.
customer_reviews.author: KDA

customer_reviews.title: Thread pull out everyone less than 1 month uses, without washing or having any pet.
customer_reviews.text: We don't have any pet, but I don't know why its fabric material has started to come out of it everywhere. We have it less than 30 days and even haven't washed it yet. I am wondering is it a normal or mine is defective! Thinking to return it soon and looking for other products! [Update] I have ordered a gorilla that has strap under seat. Now I understand how much the underseat strap is important. Without underseat strap the cover tend to slip inward always. I recommend to make sure the cover you buy has under seat strap.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Nikravan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, follow measuring instructions before purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great couch cover. I had a Sure Fit Cover that did not fit. My dog was able to pull it up and burrow in it, making a very huge hole. I purchased the Original Sofa Shield oversized cover and it fits!!!! It is also not as flimsy as the cover I had. It's far better than than the Sure Fit Cover. I would definitely recommend this product. Just make sure to follow the measuring directions before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: CM60

customer_reviews.title: Love these covers
customer_reviews.text: We had to order covers for both our couch and recliner because our youngest pup starting digging the stuffing out of them :( we didn’t want to have to replace both pieces so we figured these covers would be a great option. I ordered mine in burgundy/tan and love the colors! We ordered oversized for both items...our couch measured a little over 83” long and the oversized cover works perfectly. The oversized cover for the recliner is just a little big, but I would rather it be too big than too small. I’m a happy pug mom!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, fit and neat.
customer_reviews.text: 7/3/19. Bought two for new couches. Our 95 lb Golden Retriever is accustomed to having couch access and we bought the couches with that in mind. The Sofa Shield covered the couch perfectly, stays in place/easy to re-align and does a great job protecting the couch from dog hair, damp dog water stains, and the like. Generally use only one at a time but the spare is for when we need it (one is being cleaned or want to cover both couches.
customer_reviews.author: Thule1

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a new linen colored sofa so after dripping chocolate ice cream on it ( got the stain out) & 7 grandchildren the next day I ordered Sofa Shield - my sofa is large _ didn't measure just ordered the ex large Sofa Shield & it fits perfect!!! looks like it's custom made for my sofa & I get compliments all the time - always asked where I got it - the fabric is good well made & the color is perfect ( got the beige to match my living room) it's so nice & neat looking I don't have to take it off if I have company - yes I totally recommend Sofa Shield !!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmy

customer_reviews.title: Seems decent for the price.  Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cover for the sun room couch so rover can relax in style. The cover is plenty large enough to cover the couch and the arms. It came with a strap to hold the back in place but we have not used that strap yet. Will see if it is needed to keep the back in place. The color is a neutral beige on both sides so can be used with a variety of colored pillows. It would be nice to have some kind of straps to hold the arm covers in place but no other issues yet. In fact we just ordered another cover today for the camper sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Carlisle, PA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have a leather couch they slide off
customer_reviews.text: The material aspect of the sofa protector is very nice unfortunately they don’t stay on the strap is useless, we had to modify them and add Velcro so they’ll stop sliding off our couches they don’t protect the corner armrest at all. It was a decent price but we had to also invest about $25 for each one because they don’t stay on. They clean easy they’re greatFor pet hair the pet hair doesn’t stick to The material and you can wipe things off easily. The reason for the three stars is we had to modify them to stay on our sectional couch they slide right off leather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money - And, it stays put!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about purchasing something to cover our small, off-white sofa. But, our labraheeler insists that she's supposed to be on it, and blankets just did not stay in place and gave the room an unkempt appearance. Not only was the cover a perfect fit, but it stayed in place better than I expected. An added bonus was that the lt taupe matched the color of the sofa, so it did not detract from the room. The only thing I would change would be the length of the "flaps" that go over the arms of the sofa - I wish they were 8-10" longer (for our particular sofa).
customer_reviews.author: DLF

customer_reviews.title: Should Have Gotten This Years Ago
customer_reviews.text: Yes, check measurements. We had no idea we had an extra large couch. It looks like a normal size. The light taupe is basically khaki. It was too light to match the rest of my furniture, so I exchanged it for the tan, and that has been great. THIS IS SO MUCH EASIER THAN WASHING THE WHOLE COUCH. My husband likes to sleep on the couch, and he refuses to use sheets or take evening showers, so the couch has been very funky, to my deep frustration. This cover makes my life so much easier to handle. The kids spill raspberries and blueberries on this regularly, and the stains have washed out.
customer_reviews.author: vulturebee

customer_reviews.title: Best couch protector I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life? Product arrived quickly and the company frequently communicated status. I have 2 frisky dogs and have used couch protectors for years. This is the first one that has stayed put. It’s been on my couch for just over 24 hours and although it’s a little rumpled it has stayed in place! The color is perfect, the material is comfortable and it was simple to put on and hook up the strap. I’m very impressed. The next test will be putting it through the wash. If it comes out in good shape I’ll be ordering another. A++!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Heath

customer_reviews.title: ... into the sunroom that holds 2 cats and a great dane. I got them on yesterday with ease ...
customer_reviews.text: I received 2 couch covers for the old couches we were moving into the sunroom that holds 2 cats and a great dane. I got them on yesterday with ease and they look like they will stay for the long haul vs the nearly identical ones I had with no strap. My great dane took no time before jumping on the couches so I am relieved I received these before I moved the couches. These look well made and seems like they will hold up to all my animals. I will be ordering 2 more for the chairs I have in there as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle Deacon

customer_reviews.title: Not really water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Stupid cats like to Pee on the couch. I purchased a new couch and did not want it ruined so I bought this. Well, they peed on it and it did leak through...not bad though i was able to easily clean it up but the couch had scotch guard on it as well so that helped. But the true value is that this does keep dog and cat hair off the couch. When company is over i just pull them off and the couch looks new!!! If you don't want your cats to pee on the couch i would suggest Sssscat. That actually worked pretty good. They only need to see the can and they stay away
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to my dog's antics!
customer_reviews.text: Ours is beige on both sides....I've only had this for a week, and so glad I got it! I was previously using a sheet to cover my couch, but it would slip constantly. The day this arrived, I put it on my couch and have not had to worry about it. My dog even christened it when he threw up some grass. I was thankful it did not penetrate to the couch! It cleans up nicely, too. I was able to spot clean it, and you can't tell. I will be washing this eventually, so when I do, I will update this submission. I plan to order another one for our chair.
customer_reviews.author: WVSharonanna

customer_reviews.title: No more worries about Lab sleeping on the sofa!
customer_reviews.text: Our labrador retriever decided sleeping on the sofa in our sunroom was much more comfortable than the floor and she has a clear view of the front door. The cover stays in place with all her wiggling around. It washes like a dream and holds it's shape perfectly. It's easy to remove when company arrives and the sofa is clean and dog hair free! Just make sure to measure the back of the furniture for a perfect fit. I gambled on this less expensive cover and it is a win! We, including our dog, have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce aka PIRATE

customer_reviews.title: Won't cover sofa arms
customer_reviews.text: I read a previous review and had measured the back of my couch which helped to get the correct size. It fits everywhere but the arms. It seems that the part that covers the arms is sewn incorrectly. I had to angle this part of the cover because there was a lot of area left uncovered on the front of the arm. This is where my dog likes to prop his head so covering the sofa arm is important to us. If they would have moved this section forward about 3 inches and then attached, it would have been fine. I would have given this item five stars if the arm situation had been correct.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Strap might not hit in the right spot
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product, so can't address issues of stain resistance/ease in cleaning. I did measure the right length, and the seat and arms fit perfectly. My sofa has a higher back, so the loops for the strap are in the front of the couch, not in the back. So far the sofa protector is staying in place without the strap. I sew, so I can also move the loops further to the back. That's just something to be aware of if you have a higher-backed sofa. This is a soft, comfortable fabric - it's not shiny or slippery/sticky. I am very pleased with this and glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described, nice material. I ordered the biggest size and the dimensions are correct, however the arms dont stay in place nor does the top that flips over the headrest, It needs a strap to hold the top in place, also it appears after awhile the hooks will tear that hold the strap..Pictures show how it ends up after sitting on it. We still have to cover the couch with blankets since the cover doesn't stay in place. It covers the seat of the couch nicely.As you can see in the picture the dog is able to make her way under the blankets and cover, which is the reason for a couch cover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about quality as I've seen one similar that family have purchased in the past... after researching on amazon, I chose this one for large sofa to keep my german shepherd fur and dander of cushions... I can saw, I am very satisfied with how well the stitching and shape of the product is, fits extremely well on my74 inch sofa, and doesnt shift or fall off when the k9 jumps on and off. It's as thick as a moving blanket, yet soft to touch, will gladly order again...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We were tired of using blankets to keep dog hair off of the couch. They always fell down and looked sloppy. This cover is the perfect solution! It fits over the important spots where dog hair collects and people sit. When company comes over we just take it off and voila now they aren’t covered in dog hair when they leave! Keeps my dog happy and my guests happy too. Looks nice in the room, fits my couch well, and is very comfortable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got these as my cats and dog always tend to go on my nice couches & I hate that they’re slowly gonna get ruined. They looks great and fit perfect! Glad the light taupe is as light as it is too because I wanted a close color. Not sure on stains yet but they’ll be easy to wash. Not sure why I didn’t think of them sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Ann Field

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Remarkable
customer_reviews.text: Although the seller's description of this item is filled with hype about how different it is from similar sofa covers, there is nothing at all remarkable about it. It drapes over my old sofa acceptably, though far from a custom-looking fit. The fabric is not particularly thick or heavy. In brief, I find nothing to distinguish it from similar sofa covers $10.00 to $15.00 less. However, in all fairness, I will say that my cat seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: STANLEY LOMBARDO

customer_reviews.title: Good Cover
customer_reviews.text: Very good couch cover for pets. It's reversible and quilted on both sides. I ordered a different brand because it was generally larger, which I wanted, and it was much longer covering the couch arms. Unfortunately it was one of Amazon's knock off brands and the material wasn't as nice, and it was not reversible. Yes this does move when you sit and move around, but there isn't a couch cover out there that won't move when you sit on it. We don't use the straps because that makes readjusting it even more of a pain. All in all it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: BettyCat

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to cover the break in my couch cushions, as my older dog isn’t as steady on her feet as she used to be and was constantly stepping in between them. It’s definitely helping with that, and she seems to really like the soft fabric. I was disappointed in the flimsiness of the clips for the elastic band, however, and I wound up tucking the arm covers under the cushion because the kept flipping backwards when anyone was sitting at one of the ends of the couch. I still recommend it, though, because it’s a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erich Y.

customer_reviews.title: 4 dog household...
customer_reviews.text: We just got our first sofa cover yesterday. We had been using sheets to keep the dogs from completely destroying the couch but it looked so cluttered and just plain bad. Took the sheets off, installed this in about two minutes and I cannot get over how much better it looks. Time will tell if it will hold up to our 4 dogs but I will update the review if needed. As of right now I love it and have already ordered another one for our other couch.
customer_reviews.author: oriley2013

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new couch and have two bull terriers both under the age of three one is 75 pounds and the other 50 pounds. With that being said I would have been happy if they lasted a couple of months well they have lasted way longer than that! These things still look new and I wash them once a week. These covers have been holding up great! The hooks on the sides never come undone they stay on my couches like they were made pacifically pacifically for my couches. They have really exceeded My expectations. Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: 💞Suzanne💞

customer_reviews.title: Love These Furniture Protectors
customer_reviews.text: I ordered sizes that are oversize for my sofa and loveseat and really like the extended fit . I was not crazy about the taupe, as it was lighter than I expected, so I returned them. However, I reordered them in the dog/chocolate, and they are perfect. (Of course, having two dogs, I am using them on the dog side!) Only reason for 3 stars on stain and water resistance is because this really hasn't been put to the test, but I washed them before using, and they came out great!
customer_reviews.author: Pat C

customer_reviews.title: Cover it up
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cover to protect a very light white sofa when visitors come over and so glad that I did. It isn’t as attractive as my sofa but it does the job and protects it. It is reversible which is great and gives you another option. It doesn’t fit as tight as I would like but I also didn’t use the buckles as I didn’t want to “dent” my fabric. All in all, it is a very sturdy but very comfortable material with layers rhat make it water resistant
customer_reviews.author: shoemethemoney

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this couch cover now for roughly 2 months and I absolutely love it. I have 3 cats who shed like crazy and I needed something to protect my couch from collecting the hair and that was washable so their hair wouldn't kill our allergies. This cover is it! It's easy to put on and strip off and I wash it weekly (so probably been washed close to 8 times now) and it's still holding up! I do need to readjust it daily, but it's a small inconvenience and only because I like it to look tidy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: OK product, not for use by husbands and children!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not stay well on a couch that is well used. The strap that hooks around the back of the couch is a good idea, but the buckles ripped right through the material and broke off within a month. I added my own loops for the strap on the back. I also had to add two bungee cords to the back so that it would not pop off the couch every time you sat on it. I’m not ready to give up on this couch cover yet I may have to add a few more touches to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Thanks gor messing up my order
customer_reviews.text: So i bought the 70inch but recieved the 54inch. It was in the wrong packaging. Which I'm glad they did mess up for a few reasons. One opening the package it didnt have the straps. Two it disnt seem durable at all. It kept slipping down just as a blanket would. I guess the straps would of help hold the top but the bottom would of kept slipping up too. I had to pay 60$ instead of 30$ but i found on that had gorrila grip on it and looks just like this but thicker material. This one was verrrry thin. Get the gorrila grip one way worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Madle

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I recently got a second hand couch from a consignment store. The couch is comfortable but I didn’t like the color that much so I figured I’ll just get a cover that has a neutral color. I read the other reviews and one of the reviewers mentioned to make sure you measure your sofa/couch first and I did. I got the cover for an oversized sofa and it fits fine. I love the material and the color of the cover. Overall I’m really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: OinkyD.

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works
customer_reviews.text: This is my second sofa shield. I love the ability to switch sides and it is so easy to put on. I really like the strap that goes under the chair/sofa. It helps keep it on the sofa. The only reason I marked it down on durability is because my previous shield (exact same as the one I ordered) already has a hold in it on the underside. It doesn't hinder its ability to protect my sofa as it is on the side the hangs by the floor. Over all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Mecum

customer_reviews.title: Reversible, good quality, washes well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have light colored couches and 3 kids. Should be a recipie for disaster right? :) My daughter was potty trained and I wanted that extra safety barrier in case she had an accident. Well, she had accidents. Plenty! I was shocked because this fabric isnt super thick, but barely anything got on the couch. Ive washed it so many times and it still looks like new. No curling on the ends or anything. It is brown on one side and a nice golden beige on the other side-this makes it easy to dress up the couch when guests are coming over so it doesnt look frumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Protecting Couch from Cat Hair
customer_reviews.text: March 2019:This product is great. My cat is currently laying on my new couch and not getting hair on it. It is easy to sweep the fur off of this cover. I am going to order another for my other couch. Great product! August 2019 UPDATE: This thing has been going strong. It collects the hair like a magnet and then I simply vacuum it off. My older cat has on rare occasion thrown up on the Soda Shield and after cleaning and throwing the shield into a hot wash, I could see that nothing made it through to my fabric. I am very happy with this product half a year later!
customer_reviews.author: JSAT

customer_reviews.title: If your sofa is 78" then get this
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fit, easy to re-adjust, comfy and well made. Has a back-strap, if you need it. Low couches won't, and it's detachable. Wish they had not put the tag in front, but easy to cut off. Check fit instructions on Amazon site, and if it's right, it's a good one. Returned an inferior one (more $$) previously. Owned one month and have not laundered. dog hair vacuums up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I've rated this with 4 stars because I've only had this cover for a week and have never washed it. I purchased it because my little schnauzer had started clawing on the cloth of my sofa cushion and I wanted to protect his "bed" from damage. I haven't had to wash it yet. It's easy to put on and is as advertised. I like that it is reversible. My dog wanted nothing to do with the chocolate brown side but likes the tan side. lol. The texture of the fabric is soft and seems to be wrinkle free. It is a good buy if you're looking to cover & protect your sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Pat C

customer_reviews.title: Fit is dependent upon sofa or loveseat style.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to see that this design will fit some couches better than others depending on the furniture style. In our case, both the sofa and the loveseat covers fit our furniture just fine, although you can see the strap buckles on the ends of the backs. My wife likes accent pillows, so the pillows make the buckles less noticeable. Smoothing out the covers when you get up is a must, otherwise, they get all pulled, twisted and ugly looking. All in all, though, we're satisfied with the covers and how they look on our furniture.
customer_reviews.author: THW

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and Well made
customer_reviews.text: These are nice covers....well made, nice fabric and with buckles on the back. I actually bought them for leather furniture even though they discourage that. I find they work fine....they slip a little but the main thing is that they protect the leather from cat and dog scratches. I actually bought several larger than needed so as to tuck and get more coverage. I read lots of reviews on various types and I am more than pleased with these. I would not trust covers with grippers on leather furniture.
customer_reviews.author: dutch6

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this cover. The fabric seems to be of decent quality. The gray color is pretty true to the picture, maybe just a hair darker. The fit is what gives me a little bugaboo. I can straighten and tidy this cover, but if it is is sat on or if you move on it, the fabric everywhere else becomes displaced. It just looks sloppy. I may try a different cover as this might just be the shape and the fill of my sofa causing the issues. I won't put all the blame on this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Deja20

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Sectional
customer_reviews.text: I just put these on and so far they are better than expected as far as fit and look for our outdoor sectional. I wish they offered a cover for the ottoman. I just ordered an additional corner section since the seat size is the same dimension and I'll sew the sides to the height I need. This is the charcoal/light grey with the charcoal side showing, which just happened to match the sectional perfectly. (We cover our furniture with weather-proof covers at night as we are in the SF Bay area with damp, foggy nights.) I'm hopeful these hold up for years. We will remove for company.
customer_reviews.author: C. Holden

customer_reviews.title: The best one I have ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: This one is best because of the strap that really holds well so that you are not constantly having to rearrange it on the back or or the seats. Stays in place and that is a deal. I would have rated better but there was a lot of strings I had to cut off and lint that I had to vacuum off when I put it on. Otherwise it is the best and I have bought or made many of these items since I have a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Trish H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Sofa Cover!
customer_reviews.text: I have a corduroy sofa and a small dog that loves to scratch. This is the last sofa cover I need to buy :) The sizing detail is very helpful to fit the sofa properly and the wide elastic strap going across the back works great. I have tried several other covers and this one is the best. I bought the dark chocolate cover and it looks really nice and stays put. The price is good and delivery quick. My pup is happy and so am I. All good :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality except one piece
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It is very thick and soft. I have two 90 lbs dogs that I needed to protect my couch from. They use their paws to dig in the couch before they lay down and they haven't even put a dent in it. Sadly, the little cloth pieces that hold the strap to the main part almost immediately got a hole each of them where the hook slid part way out. And just yesterday (after having it a month or so) I noticed one of them has almost completely torn off. It will still work but it won't be held up by the strap. I wish they would have use similar quality material on those two pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover for my sofa and dog!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 86 lb. German Shepherd that loves to sneak up on the sofa. This sofa cover (dark grey) matches and fits our sofa perfectly! The material is great, nice and smooth, does not collect dog hair, and dust wipes off easily. It washes beautifully, and only a few minutes on a low dryer setting gets rids of any wrinkles from the washing machine. Feels much higher quality than I thought I'd get for the price. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LL B

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Stay Put
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for two separate couches. They are both different styles of couches, but I couldn't get the back cover (that goes over the back) to stay put. Even though it was tucked under the elastic band, and the elastic held it tight, every time a dog or person sat on the couch, it flopped back over the couch. I have large dogs, so maybe that is why it didn't work, but I ended up wasting money on two of these and can't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ann Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Best couch cover ever!
customer_reviews.text: This couch cover was excellent!! It is the first time that the couch cover was wide enough for my sofa recliners!! This stays in place even without the back strap on!! My old cover kept sliding down and did not stay in place!! This is the most Awesome couch cover and it’s double sided!! I also bought the chair cover and it fits 3 different chairs of mine!! I am going to buy more of them!
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Pettit

customer_reviews.title: More impressive than it looks!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn’t have high expectations for this since it’s a reasonably priced general cover. But after putting it on my couch, I’m definitely impressed! It’s a lot softer than I was expecting, kinda suede-y feel. It fits well! I think my couch is a little deeper than standard, but it still tucks under the cushions the way it should. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Akins

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pet parents
customer_reviews.text: These couch covers are a must have for any pet parent! We have 2 large Labrador retrievers that stay in our house which means most everything gets covered in hair and drool. These covers work great to keep our furniture looking new and hair/drool free! Another plus about these covers is the fact that they have a strap that holds them in place around the back side of the couch so that they stay in place when the dogs are jumping on and off the couch. Very easy to take off and wash .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: The Sofa Shield Reversible Slipcover is well made. I bought the oversized sofa and loveseat covers for my recently purchased sofa and loveseat. We have a young yellow lab who in the past has been allowed on the couches. The slipcovers fit perfectly and should allow our lab to continue cuddling with me on the couch. The strap that goes behind the back of the couch ensures that the cover will stay put. My lab hasn't yet done her crazy run from couch to loveseat to couch over and over again, but I have full confidence that the slipcover will withstand the craziness and remain in place.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the size indicated
customer_reviews.text: Although it says good for up to 70 inch sofas it's not quite 70 inches itself. Mine measured 68 inches across so there is a little gap where the sofa shows. Luckily the dog seems to prefer one side of the sofa so we just make sure that's the side that's fully covered. Other than that it's working pretty well. The back stays on fine and the front stays down most of the time. The arm covers are the ones that tend to get pulled down, but easy enough to flip back over.
customer_reviews.author: ScoobyFan

customer_reviews.title: Really an OK Cover
customer_reviews.text: The strap around the back makes all the difference. It comes off like others have said, but I put large safety pins in to secure the strap to the loops before I put it over the back of the sofa. I don't think it's waterproof so I put hospital type mats down on top where the dog lies so if he jumps on with dirty feet, etc., I don't have to keep pulling the cover off to wash it--just take off and wash the waterproof mats.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S

customer_reviews.title: I like!
customer_reviews.text: I like it, our couch is a light beige color so this fit perfectly. I didn't want a weirdly colored cover. It doesn't really stay in place, it's not something I mind. It's really thick though. My puppy has chewed it (then lost interest) and its held up nicely. Update: still loving these, have recently flipped it since its 2 toned and gotta say, I love the option. Feels like we got a new couch! Our fur baby is constantly rubbing up on it and snuggling, and they're super easy to wash when they get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: viviana

customer_reviews.title: Worth quilted thickness and material easy wash
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Sofa size for our CalKing bed. End tabs unless but nice bed thick quilted cover. Not water proof means it breaths if your in the bed! Easy wash/dry back in bed. Time will tell longevity. Winter rains messy paws but sufficient absorbent to keep bed blanket dry. We all like on watching TV, Daisy barks with TV dogs. Off at bedtime 🌙. Limited color choice but blue/pink-maroon bright. Love wide choices with Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: B. Speer

customer_reviews.title: The only cover to stay in place!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my first set about three weeks. Have already ordered and received my second set. I use them for couch and loveseat for a dog and an incontinent adult. I am so tired of straightening covers every time I walk by...the strap on this brand works fantastic for keeping them in place. I have an one accident that went through but for the most part they are 'water resistant'. They wash wonderfully. Haven't had any stains to remove, so no comment. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and better than using sheets
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to using sheets to cover couch from dog hair. I didn’t measure mine as I knew it was oversized. The cover works great just wish it was made to overlap some areas especially where the arms meet the back cushions of the couch. It covers the arms as the picture shows but would be nice if they covered the full length of the arms (back cushion to front of arm). Catches a majority of the dog hair so far. It’s a huge upgrade from what i was using so I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wabih

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for People with Little Ones
customer_reviews.text: This couch cover is a great buy especially for people with young kids. I had to scrub our couches often because we have a 19 month old who seems to always have sticky hands no matter how much I clean them. Now we routinely wash this cover and our couches are pristine once again! They hold up well against small/average amounts of liquid but I think with a whole cup of water it would leak through.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ann

customer_reviews.title: It broke
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had reviewed this item but alas I hadn’t. This seat cover is of good material... it’s thick enough but not bulky and the color matches my sofa perfectly. I love how it’s reversible. My big, BIG con is that within maybe a week? one of the hooks on the elastic broke. So it made it useless. It didn’t seem to be able to support the stretch. Every time I put it on, the hook would tilt and the pressurr was put all on one little corner until it snapped. Very poor quality or mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: MelSB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: So I did not receive the strap to keep it in place when it arrived but I didn't like the strap in the pictures anyway. This is not easy to clean. I tried to vacuum it last night and nothing would come up as far as dog hair goes. I tried to beat it with a broom and of course dog hair flew up but flew right back onto the "sofa shield." It IS soft and comfortable. I will give it that. But disappointed all around.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitting sofa cover
customer_reviews.text: We received our new Sofa Cover 1 day ago and are very pleased. The size (70") fits our sofa very well. The elastic strap that helps to hold the cover in place seems secure and well-placed. We like the appearance & color of the cover -- it suits our living area decor and is a definite improvement over the old cover. I am considering buying a 2nd cover to have on hand when it comes time to launder this one.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but slides around
customer_reviews.text: I have large dogs that shed, and dont care to wipe their feet. This cover works great for keeping my new couches looking new. Easily washed in the washer, and hung to dry. The flap that drapes over the back is very short, so it doesnt hold up well to constant movement. its so short that it doesnt even reach the elastic to hold in down. I constantly have to adjust the cover from sliding around.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: It cover very nicely my couch. The material is very good for the price,pets hair come off easily (both dog and cat) which was the main reason I got this (everybody that owns a Labrador know what I mean) It's not water-proof, so if that is a concern ,another customer suggested to use a waterproof bed pad for elderly that come in different sizes. -  -
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but could benefit from a small design change
customer_reviews.text: This sofa cover works well and is easily cleaned. The one thing I'd change would be to make the covers for the sofa arms longer front to back so that when our dog puts her head on the couch's arm rest--which is her normal position--the arm rest is fully covered and does not get dog slobber on the couch. We have both the 2-cushion and 4-cushion models and they both suffer from the same design deficiency. Other than that the covers do a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This is a soft and comfortable couch cover. I purchased it because my dogs are always on the couch. The color is nice and it is reversible. (I have returned another cover that wasn't as nice.) This cover is comfy and the strap is designed to hold it in place but isn't really visible. This cover fits my 72" leather couch with a curved back well, and doesn't slide. The dogs love it. I didn't give 5 stars because I haven't had it long enough to see if it stains or shrinks.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Like the color
customer_reviews.text: I bought a slipcover similar to this one. Not sure if it is from the same company. I liked the first one because it seemed to resist cat hair. As it got older, it started to hold on to the fur. This one is a bit smaller than the first. The way to secure it was also different. Neither one was very good at securing the slipcover but the first was a bit better. At this point, the cover seems ok even if there is less material.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel of this sofa cover!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a new sofa and with 4 dogs in the house, I wanted to keep it looking great so bought this protector. Love the color and the fact it's reversible. It came on time and is the color combo I wanted. Size is perfect. Haven't had any spills on it yet, so can't comment on that. Stays in place and looks great! I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mukti and Dharma

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to protect my couch from the German Shepherd dog hair. I have an overstuffed, microfiber leather sofa and a tan sable German Shepherd. Her hair shows up like a sore thumb on my sofa and the microfiber makes the hair stick. I like the way it fits, it protects the fabric. The only thing I would of liked would be more straps to hold the back in place better. It's constantly falling down. But I like it and will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: ZoomT12

customer_reviews.title: good value for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Well seeing how my little doggie decided to redesign my sofa I figured I would try this cover. I have only had it a few days so I can't say anything about wear or stain resistance, but is very well made with quilted type sewing all across the cover. Excellent strap across the back and fits my couch well. I measured the entire width of the back and matched the cover size to that measurement. Fits very well and covers the entire couch. So far... Doggie approved!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kingsbury

customer_reviews.title: These are not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I was most hoping for what the product claimed, a waterproof couch cover, which it is not. I was not happy that o bought covers for all my living room furniture to help with a new dog and spills. The first spill went right through. They are okay protecting against pet odors and minor spills. I am also constantly rearranging them to look neat but I think that is more the nature of having a couch cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place
customer_reviews.text: The elastic band keeps the back part from sliding down — a great improvement over the plain drop cloth I previously used. The quilted fabric breathes and is comfortable to sit on, and it is generously proportioned for my sofa that has large roll arms. The dark brown color didn’t bleed when washed, and there was no shrinkage in the dryer. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Janis P.

customer_reviews.title: Washes up nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I like that he large size completely. covers my sofa. I have washed it many times, and the colors have not faded. I have had it a few months, and there has been no tears or holes and still looks new. I like the strap that holds the back overlap in place. Another cover that I bought did not have this feature and the back was always sliding down. My only complaint about this cover is that one of the sewn hooks is coming undone from the cover. I will have to stitch it down again. I like this one so much, that I bought a second one to replace the other one that keeps sliding down.
customer_reviews.author: CSS

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful, very soft and easy to use sofa cover. I had been making to with a throw blanket and it worked Ok, but it slipped a lot. I finally broke down and purchased this, and wish I had done so sooner. I recommend you measure your sofa before purchasing. I almost ordered the regular size, but measured and realized I needed oversized. It washed up well (I always wash fabrics before use), and dried nicely. The strap on the back keeps this in place well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Quilted Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year for Christmas so my service dog and I could be more comfortable on the faux leather couch. He loves it, soft and warm. I love the dual colors to switch by flipping over and ease of washing. I was warned not to use on leather, but thought faux leather might be a bit different... nope. It will slide some, straps help to keep in place, but truly, I have spent many an hour to find the one I like... this is it. Best quality for the price, truly.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Mary MacTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works on leather!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the manufacturer not recommending the product for use on leather, we took a chance and decided to try it anyway. The cover works fine on a leather sofa as well as on a leather chair. The strap holds the cover securely in place. We have small dogs that jump on and off the sofa and the cover did not slide off. We are very pleased with these covers and would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: sonagadu

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Instead of saving your sofa, it will destroy it.
customer_reviews.text: Do Not buy this item. See attached pictures. It’s just 4 months. On both sides of the straps, sofa leather has gone bad because of that metal attached to the band. It’s a bad design as by default people will sit on sofa which will rub that metal on sofa and sofa will go bad. The cloth attached to the main cover to attach and toe band teared off completely from one side and has a hole in other side. You are ultimately loosing your money you spent on sofa by putting it on sofa.
customer_reviews.author: yogesh aggarwal

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: So we have had the couch cover and two recliner covers on our loveseat with center console. So far I really like them. Seem to help keep the couch clean and the dog hair off the couch. You do have to straighten them out every so often but they stay in place better than I thought they would. Easy to put on the couch, easy to remove to wash. Overall I’m liking them both. I did measure before I ordered but wish the couch cover was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: W Watkins

customer_reviews.title: After three years still fabulous
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the brown/tan covers almost 3 years ago. They still look great!! Even the dark brown side has not faded. These are usually washed once a week (sometimes more) and they have held up nicely. No loose threads or fraying. These are not waterproof so if you spill or have a pet that licks, you will have moisture seep thru. However better than zero! Our dog is not a digger so we don’t use the rubber bands that come with it. Easiest thing to wash and dry (cool/low heat). They stay put. The dark brown has never bled into my light furniture. A+ product for fur and dirt. MEASURE for right size!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan E.

product_meta.title: Sofa Shield Original Patent Pending Reversible Large Sofa Protector for Seat Width up to 70 Inch, Furniture Slipcover, 2 Inch Strap, Couch Slip Cover Throw for Pets, Dogs, Cats, Sofa, Chocolate Beige
feature_bullets: THE MOST COLORS AND PATTERNS: We offer more colors and patterns to better fit your individual style! Choose from dozens of Sofa Shield designs that will help make your home beautiful, all while protecting your furniture. Plus, Sofa Shield offers you more sizes! Choose from our line to fit your sofa, loveseat, futon, recliner, chair, chaise and sectional. Finally, a furniture protector that offers you and your home a stylish upgrade.

PERFECT FIT: We offer our sofa sized covers in the most sizes for the perfect fit. Choose from the SMALL (62" seat width), LARGE (70" seat width) or X-LARGE OVERSIZED (78" seat width). See our Measuring Guide in the photos for a list of all measurements.

/!\ WARNING: Strap should not be stretched to exceed seat width +10” (Large Sofa, Futon, Small Sofa, Loveseat, 48” Chair, 23” Chair, Small Recliner, Chaise Lounge, Sectional Corner) or +16” (Extra Large Oversized Sofa, Large Recliner). Over-stretching strap can result in strap breaking and snapping back at you!

A BETTER FURNITURE PROTECTOR: The Original Sofa Shield protectors feature the most generous size to cover more of your furniture, have a much higher thread count for an extra soft feel, and are the thickest and plushest for the most comfort. They’re also tested to be 100% machine washable and dryable. Plus, they come with an exclusively designed, patent-pending 2” thick and adjustable strap (to help hold your cover in place) engineered to be strong and effective for your Sofa Shield cover.

LIFETIME WARRANTY: We stand behind our product. All of our furniture protectors come with a LIFETIME NO QUESTIONS ASKED WARRANTY. If you are at all unsatisfied with your product for any reason (even if it’s the dog's fault), please contact us (through Amazon if past the standard return window) and we will be happy to assist you. Our goal is for you to be happy!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars9,996 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
